GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles?topic=:id.description: Returns only the articles for the given topic.

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:id.description: serves an array of specific article by id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for the provided article id

comment.body: I am 100% sure that we're not completely sure.
comment.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a comment on article. Request body accepts an object with the username and body. Api responds with the posted comment.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: update an article by article_id. Api responds with the updated comment
